Insurance::Reminder#active? when a reminder date is today is expected to equal false
Insurance::Reminder#active? when a reminder date is in the future is expected to equal true
Insurance::Reminder#active? when a reminder date is before today is expected to equal false
Insurance::Reminder#active? when a reminder date has not been set is expected to equal false
Insurance::Reminder#stale? when a reminder date is today is expected to equal true
Insurance::Reminder#stale? when a reminder date is in the future is expected to equal false
Insurance::Reminder#stale? when a reminder date is before today is expected to equal true
Insurance::Reminder#stale? when a reminder date has not been set is expected to equal true
Insurance::Reminder#destroy_if_stale when reminder is stale destroys the reminder
Insurance::Reminder#destroy_if_stale when reminder is active does not destroy the reminder
Insurance::Reminder#sync_reminder_to_salesforce syncs to salesforce on create

examples.description: Given the current date is 2022-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2018-01-01 -> And they are running payroll in the 2023 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Director payroll profile calculated on the annual basis with NI letter A -> And they are paid £4000 monthly -> When in month 10 they become a veteran and change to letter V -> And they run payroll in month 12 -> Then total employee NIC should be £4594.51 -> And total employer NIC should be £3908.57
examples.full_description: Payroll NI Calculations 2023 Calculating NIC for an existing Director who starts receiving veteran NIC relief Given the current date is 2022-04-06 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2018-01-01 -> And they are running payroll in the 2023 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Director payroll profile calculated on the annual basis with NI letter A -> And they are paid £4000 monthly -> When in month 10 they become a veteran and change to letter V -> And they run payroll in month 12 -> Then total employee NIC should be £4594.51 -> And total employer NIC should be £3908.57
